casebody.data:
GOODYEAR TIRE & RUBBER COMPANY, Inc., Plaintiff, Plaintiff in Error, v. Juan G. GALLARDO, Treasurer, Defendant, Defendant in Error. Circuit Court of Appeals. First Circuit. August 15, 1928. Nos. 2276, 2277.

Before BINGHAM, JOHNSON, and ANDERSON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Upon stipulation of counsel, it is ordered that this case be docketed and dismissed, and that mandate issue forthwith.
